news_items.headline: Shanghai to help Tesla resume production amid coronavirus spread
news_items.lede: U.S. electric carmaker Tesla's <TSLA.O> factory in China's financial hub of Shanghai will resume production on Feb. 10 with assistance to help it cope with a spreading epidemic of coronavirus, a Shanghai government official said on Saturday.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PICTURE: Tesla China-made Model 3 vehicles are seen during a delivery event at its factory in Shanghai, China Jan. 7, 2020. REUTERS/Aly Song/File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla Shanghai factory to resume production on Feb 10, authorities to assist - govt official
news_items.lede: U.S. electric carmaker Tesla's factory in China's financial hub of Shanghai will resume production on Feb. 10, a Shanghai government official said on Saturday, adding that authorities would provide assistance to the firm.

news_items.headline: Tesla's surge inspires fans to buy, skeptics to dig in, drives fear of missing out
news_items.lede: Pretty much everyone on Wall Street has an opinion about Tesla <TSLA.O>.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Tesla Inc CEO Elon Musk walks next to a screen showing an image of Tesla Model 3 car during an opening ceremony for Tesla China-made Model Y program in Shanghai, China January 7, 2020. REUTERS/Aly Song/File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla battery supplier to resume output in China on February 10
news_items.lede: LG Chem <051910.KS>, an electric vehicle battery supplier for Tesla Inc <TSLA.O>, said on Friday it planned to partly resume output at its facilities in China on Feb. 10, suspended since Feb. due to the coronavirus outbreak.

news_items.headline: Tesla's surge inspires fans to buy, skeptics to dig in, drives fear of missing out
news_items.lede: Pretty much everyone on Wall Street has an opinion about Tesla.

news_items.headline: Elon Musk’s liability for Tesla’s SolarCity deal could come down to a question of his control
news_items.lede: Does Elon Musk, who owns just 22.1% of Tesla’s shares, control the company he founded and continues to lead? If so, according to a summary judgment ruling issued Tuesday by Vice-Chancellor Joseph Slights of Delaware Chancery Court, Delaware law presumes that he wielded coercive...

news_items.headline: Tesla tumbles 17% as electrifying rally loses power
news_items.lede: Tesla's <TSLA.O> stock tumbled 17% on Wednesday, hitting the brakes on a dramatic rally as a senior executive said the coronavirus outbreak in China would delay deliveries of its Model 3 cars and analysts warned of its high valuation.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: A Tesla sign is seen on the Shanghai Gigafactory of the U.S. electric car maker before a delivery ceremony in Shanghai, China January 7, 2020. REUTERS/Aly Song/File Photo

news_items.headline: With Tesla stock envy, GM hopes to sell investors on its EV, tech future
news_items.lede: General Motors Co <GM.N> has watched with frustration and envy as the market value of electric carmaker Tesla Inc <TSLA.O> has ballooned to about two and a half times GM's size, but on Wednesday the Detroit automaker made the case that its EV and self-driving technology...
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: General Motors Chief Executive Officer Mary Barra announces a major investment focused on the development of GM future technologies at the GM Orion Assembly Plant in Lake Orion, Michigan, U.S. March 22, 2019.  REUTERS/Rebecca Cook/File Photo

news_items.headline: With Tesla stock envy, GM hopes to sell investors on its EV, tech future
news_items.lede: General Motors Co has watched with frustration and envy as the market value of electric carmaker Tesla Inc has ballooned to more than triple GM's size, but Wednesday the Detroit automaker is expected to make the case that its EV and self-driving technology strategy deserves...

news_items.headline: 'Giga Texas?' Musk asks Twitter users to vote on new gigafactory
news_items.lede: Elon Musk, the billionaire chief executive officer of Tesla Inc <TSLA.O>, went on Twitter to ask users if the electric carmaker should build a new gigafactory in Texas.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Tesla CEO Elon Musk speaks about new Autopilot features during a Tesla event in Palo Alto, California October 14, 2015. REUTERS/Beck Diefenbach/File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla rally fueled by fear of missing out, not short squeeze - investors
news_items.lede: A nearly 14% gain in Tesla Inc's stock on Tuesday was likely sparked by investors looking to hop aboard its remarkable rally, rather than a reversal of bearish bets, an analysis of positioning dynamics showed.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: The logo of Tesla is seen in Taipei, Taiwan August 11, 2017. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu

news_items.headline: Musk's Tesla stake worth $30 billion after electrifying stock surge
news_items.lede: Tesla is making Elon Musk a lot richer without paying him a dime.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Tesla Inc CEO Elon Musk attends the World Artificial Intelligence Conference (WAIC) in Shanghai, China August 29, 2019. REUTERS/Aly Song

news_items.headline: Musk's Tesla stake worth $30 billion after electrifying stock surge
news_items.lede: Tesla is making Elon Musk a lot richer without paying him a dime.

news_items.headline: Another day, another record: Tesla shares march toward $1,000
news_items.lede: Shares of Tesla Inc <TSLA.O> surged 20% on Tuesday to hit $940, extending a stunning rally that has more than doubled the company's market value since the start of the year as more investors bet on Chief Executive Elon Musk's vision.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: The front hood logo on a 2018 Tesla Model 3 electric vehicle is shown in this photo illustration taken in Cardiff, California, U.S., June 1, 2018. REUTERS/Mike Blake/File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla up 20% after Panasonic posts first quarterly profit at battery business
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc's stock surged 20% on Monday in its largest one-day gain since 2013, fueled by a quarterly profit at Panasonic's battery business with the U.S. car maker and an investor report predicting its shares would rise more than ten-fold by 2024.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: The Panasonic booth is shown during the 2020 CES in Las Vegas, Nevada, U.S. January 7, 2020. REUTERS/Steve Marcus/File Photo

news_items.headline: Panasonic shares soar on profit at U.S. battery business with Tesla
news_items.lede: Shares of Panasonic Corp jumped more than 8% in early Tuesday trade after the Japanese electronics conglomerate the previous day reported its first quarterly profit at its U.S. battery venture with Tesla Inc .

news_items.headline: UPDATE 2-Panasonic posts 1st quarterly profit in U.S. battery business with Tesla
news_items.lede: * Follows years of production troubles, delays at U.S. partner

news_items.headline: China's CATL signs battery supply agreement with Tesla
news_items.lede: China's top electric vehicle battery maker CATL <300750.SZ> said on Monday it has signed a battery supply agreement with Tesla <TSLA.O>.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Tesla China-made Model 3 vehicles are seen during a delivery event at its factory in Shanghai, China January 7, 2020. REUTERS/Aly Song/File Photo

news_items.headline: CORRECTED-China's CATL says signed battery supply agreement with Tesla
news_items.lede: China's top electric vehicle battery maker CATL said on Monday it has signed a battery supply agreement with Tesla.

news_items.headline: Tesla directors settle, isolating Musk as SolarCity trial looms
news_items.lede: Directors of Tesla Inc settled a shareholder lawsuit over the company's 2016 acquisition of SolarCity Corp, leaving Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk as the lone defendant facing claims that Tesla paid $2.6 billion for a worthless solar energy system installer, according...
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Elon Musk, Chairman of SolarCity and CEO of Tesla Motors, speaks at SolarCity's Inside Energy Summit in Manhattan, New York October 2, 2015. REUTERS/Rashid Umar Abbasi/File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla directors settle, isolating Musk as SolarCity trial looms
news_items.lede: Directors of Tesla Inc settled a shareholder lawsuit over its 2016 acquisition of SolarCity Corp, leaving Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk as the lone defendant facing claims that Tesla paid $2.6 billion for a worthless solar system installer, according to court documents.

news_items.headline: Tesla shares hit record after blowout results, strong delivery forecast
news_items.lede: Shares of Tesla Inc opened at a record high on Thursday as Wall Street analysts were encouraged by the company's better-than-expected quarterly results and delivery targets for the year.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: A Tesla supercharger is shown at a charging station in Santa Clarita, California, U.S. October 2, 2019.    REUTERS/Mike Blake/File Photo

news_items.headline: CORRECTED-Tesla shares surge after blowout results, strong delivery forecast
news_items.lede: Shares of Tesla Inc rose 11% and were set to open at a record high on Thursday as Wall Street analysts cheered the company's better-than-expected quarterly results and delivery targets for the year.

news_items.headline: Tesla partners with LG Chem, CATL for battery supply
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc <TSLA.O> has entered into a partnership with South Korea's LG Chem Ltd <051910.KS> and China's CATL <300750.SZ> for supply of batteries used in its electric cars, the company said on Wednesday.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: The logo of Tesla is seen in Taipei, Taiwan August 11, 2017. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu/File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla extends profit run, promises record production, driving stock up 13%
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc <TSLA.O> posted its second quarterly profit in a row as vehicle deliveries hit a record and the company said it would comfortably make more than half a million units this year, pushing its shares to new highs.
news_items.img_cap: Tesla super chargers are shown in Mojave, California, U.S. July 10, 2019.       REUTERS/Mike Blake

news_items.headline: Tesla beats fourth-quarter revenue estimates
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc posted fourth-quarter revenue above analysts' estimates on Wednesday as the electric carmaker beat Wall Street estimates for vehicle deliveries.

news_items.headline: High expectations for Tesla, and a long way to go to match rivals' steady profit
news_items.lede: Buckle up. Tesla's quarterly report could be another wild ride for investors.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Tesla super chargers are shown in Mojave, California, U.S. July 10, 2019.       REUTERS/Mike Blake

news_items.headline: Tesla's Musk seeks to allay water concerns at factory site after protests
news_items.lede: Tesla <TSLA.O> Chief Executive Elon Musk sought to allay environmental concerns about the electric carmaker's planned factory in Germany, saying the plant would use less water than was estimated originally.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: SpaceX owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk gestures during a conversation with legendary game designer Todd Howard (not pictured) at the E3 gaming convention in Los Angeles, California, U.S., June 13, 2019.  REUTERS/Mike Blake

news_items.headline: U.S. senator slams Tesla's 'misleading' name for Autopilot driver assistance system
news_items.lede: A U.S. senator on Friday urged Tesla Inc <TSLA.O> to rebrand its driver assistance system Autopilot, saying it has "an inherently misleading name" and is subject to potentially dangerous misuse.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: An advertisement promotes Tesla Autopilot at a showroom of U.S. car manufacturer Tesla in Zurich, Switzerland March 28, 2018. REUTERS/Arnd Wiegmann/File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla touts safeguards as senator urges company to rebrand 'Autopilot'
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc touted safeguards to its driver assistance system "Autopilot" after a Democratic U.S. senator on Friday urged the automaker to rebrand the system because it has "an inherently misleading name."

news_items.headline: Tesla's German factory gets off to an explosive start
news_items.lede: Seven U.S. bombs from World War Two have been found in the plot of land outside Berlin where electric car pioneer Tesla <TSLA.O> wants to build its first European factory, local authorities said on Thursday.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Warning tape is pictured at a construction site at Heidestrasse street near the capital's central train station, after a World War Two bomb was discovered at the site in Berlin, Germany, April 19, 2018. REUTERS/Axel Schmidt/File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla overtakes Volkswagen as world's second most valuable carmaker
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc <TSLA.O> has overtaken Germany's Volkswagen <VOWG_p.DE> as the world's second most valuable carmaker behind Japan's Toyota <7203.T>, as the meteoric rise in the U.S. electric vehicle maker's shares reshuffles the global market.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: A Tesla Model X electric car is seen at Brussels Motor Show, Belgium, January 9, 2020. REUTERS/Francois Lenoir

news_items.headline: Michigan, Tesla settle suit over direct vehicle sales
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc and the state of Michigan confirmed Wednesday they have resolved the company's 2016 lawsuit challenging the state's refusal to allow the company to sell vehicles directly to consumers.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: A Tesla logo is seen at a groundbreaking ceremony of Tesla Shanghai Gigafactory in Shanghai, China January 7, 2019. REUTERS/Aly Song

news_items.headline: Tesla's furious rally pushes market value past $100 billion
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc shares surged on Wednesday, and the company became the first publicly listed U.S. automaker to cross $100 billion in market valuation, more than Ford Motor Co and General Motors Co combined.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Philip Floyd, senior engineering technician for the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety (IIHS), demonstrates a front crash prevention test on a 2018 Tesla Model 3 at the IIHS-HLDI Vehicle Research Center in Ruckersville, Virginia, U.S., July 22, 2019./File Photo

news_items.headline: Tesla races past $100 bln in market valuation
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc on Wednesday crossed $100 billion in market valuation for the first time, further extending its lead over Ford Motor Co and General Motors Co.

news_items.headline: Tesla crosses $100 billion stock market valuation in extended trading
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc became the first $100 billion publicly listed U.S. carmaker in extended trading on Tuesday, in a sign of Wall Street's confidence in an all-electric future.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Tesla super chargers are shown in Mojave, California, U.S. July 10, 2019.    REUTERS/Mike Blake/File Photo

news_items.headline: Michigan, Tesla reach agreement for direct car delivery: source
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc <TSLA.O> has reached a settlement with Michigan to allow the electric-car maker to directly deliver its vehicles to customers in the state, a person familiar with the agreement said on Tuesday.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: Philip Floyd, senior engineering technician for the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety (IIHS), demonstrates a front crash prevention test on a 2018 Tesla Model 3 at the IIHS-HLDI Vehicle Research Center in Ruckersville, Virginia, U.S., July 22, 2019./File Photo

news_items.headline: Michigan, Tesla reach agreement for direct car sales - source
news_items.lede: Tesla Inc has reached a settlement with Michigan to allow the electric carmaker to directly sell vehicles in the state, a person familiar with the agreement said on Tuesday.

news_items.headline: Tesla moves a step closer to opening first European factory with German property deal
news_items.lede: U.S. electric car pioneer Tesla <TSLA.O> has agreed to buy a property on the outskirts of Berlin, bringing it a step closer to opening its first European factory, local authorities said on Sunday.
news_items.img_cap: FILE PHOTO: A demonstrators holds pro-Tesla poster during an action to support plans by U.S. electric vehicle pioneer Tesla to build its first European factory and design center in Gruenheide near Berlin, Germany January 18, 2020. REUTERS/Pawel Kopczynski
